item.title: Aerospace Tiling Window Manager for macOS
item.description:
Aerospace is my new favourite macOS app….

My daily work involves a LOT of open browsers and applications (Word, Excel etc) and finding a way to navigate the many browser windows/tabs and applications has been an ongoing journey. Along the way I have used BetterTouch Tool, Keyboard Maestro, Moom, Apple Spaces and many other combinations of these and other applications.

My latest incarnation of these tools had been working reasonably well for me (to a point) but then I happened across Aerospace. After delving into a number of YouTube videos I found this one. This wasn’t the first YouTube video on Aerospace I had seen but it was certainly the clearest and easiest to follow.

After watching thi video I installed and opened Aerospace.toml in VS Code and got to work on configuring for my needs.
